column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column4: Definition
If the seed was used in this experiment, as in planted or ground up, place 1 in this fied. Leave blank otherwise.
If the seed was collected in this experiment, as in harvested, place 1 in this field. Leave blank otherwise.
The experiment's name to which this seed is being used for OR collected from. The upload method is different for if seed is being used or collected. Leave blank if not applicable.
A unique ID in the format 08PN0023_001x. This is the ID that is printed on seed packets. MUST BE UNIQUE
A more human readable name for the seed.
Options: sib, self, cross
The genotype of the seed. Examples: B73, Mo17, CML52xCML322
An indicator if the seed is available and whether it has been inventoried.
The date when the seed was stocked. Format: 2015-01-30
If the seed was inoculated or not. Use 1 for inoculated, 0 for uninoculated.
Any additional comments about the seed.
The genus of the seed. Example: Zea
The species of the seed. Example: Mays
A more general classification of the seed's genotype. Example: NAM
The Row ID from which the seed was collected. Example 08PN0023. Leave blank if seed not collected from a row.
The Field Name from which the seed was collected. Example Aurora NY. Leave blank if not relevant.
The Plant ID from which the seed was collected. Example 08PN0023_001. Leave blank if seed not collected from a plant.
The username of the person which collected the seed. Example: firstname_lastname. Leave blank if seed not collected.
The date when the seed was collected. Format 2015-01-30. Leave blank if seed not collected
The method which seed was collected by. Example: Manual field harvest. Leave blank if seed not collected
Any additional comments about the collection. Leave blank if seed not collected.
The organization from which seed was provided by. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
The first name of the person who provided the seed. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
The last name of the person who provided the seed. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
The phone of the person who provided the seed. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
The email of the person who provided the seed. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
Any additional comments about the seed provider. Leave blank if seed not sourced from somewhere.
